programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E128
programme.desc: Convencido de que Hilario necesitaba intimidarlo para no seguir investigando sobre la muerte de su padre, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de haberle disparado a Florencia; la polica detiene la discusion. Victoria descubre a Felipe y a Clementina registrando la carta que Sergio escribio para ella, lo que la enardece; Felipe convence a Victoria de confiar en que el la ayudar a encontrar la justicia gracias a la confesion de Sergio: Fernanda Alcoy est detrs de los diversos asesinatos. Una vez en el hospital, Florencia revela todos sus secretos ante Nicols: la mujer que le disparo fue Fernanda del Casal para evitar que la acusara con la polica por la muerte de Genara y Sergio; Florencia adems asume su responsabilidad de haber provocado a Victoria para tener una ria con ella y hacer creer que fue por su culpa que perdio a su hijo, pero Victoria se contuvo; Nicols est sorprendido. El ltimo secreto que revela Florencia es que el verdadero asesino de Jaimito del Casal es Rosendo Zapata.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E17
programme.desc: Ezequiel castiga a Gregorio por su relacion con Julia, es un Aragon. Julia est desaparecida y no se conoce su paradero, es parte de la venganza contra Ezequiel. Max insiste en ayudar a Camila y ella reconoce que siente algo por el.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E18
programme.desc: Retendrn a Julia secuestrada hasta que Ezequiel le suplique que le devuelvan a su hija sana y salva. Camila no se d por vencida, quiere saber quien es El Doliente y piensa que puede ser su mam por la foto de la nia del vestido amarillo que recibio.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E36
programme.desc: Gabriel se presenta ante Clara Ines, la joven lo abraza feliz de comprobar que no est muerto.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E37
programme.desc: Cirilo sorprende a Pastora y la somete, la amenaza con matarla si la mujer se le opone a gritar pidiendo ayuda.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E36
programme.desc: Guillermo is fixated on taking his woman and Ignacio with him. Alberto warns Gertrudis that he will do the impossible to free Malena from Pablos violence. Elvis advises Ricardo to be honest with the Maras or they will all end up with him - Virginia arrives to meet Liz and Augusto, ready to leave with the couple; to everyones surprise, Carmen appears. Alberto proposes to Lorena.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E37
programme.desc: Carmen accuses Luis and Augusto of trafficking minors. Ricardo is cornered: on the one hand he feels he cannot maintain a relationship with four women at the same time, but on the other hand there is the million dollars lost. Gertrudis celebrates that the success in the drug traffickers trial opens the door for all of them to trust her Legal Office. Alberto is leaving the Corona house when Guillermo intercepts him on his motorcycle; threatening, he lifts the visor of his helmet and is exposed to his rival.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E33
programme.desc: Luego de contarle a Francesca la noticia de que Tatianita es hija del gordo, Ninoska se marcha a casa de los Perroni.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E34
programme.desc: En una fuerte discusion, Azalea le dice a Cesar que, aunque la nia sea su hija, jams aceptar en la familia a la hija de una ramera. Justo en ese instante llega Matilde.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E127
programme.desc: Ante la tumba de Sergio, Victoria llora desconsolada por haber perdido al nico hombre que realmente la amo y le brindo su apoyo incondicional. Entre tanto, Nicols se entera de la muerte de Sergio Escalante mediante la prensa donde se informa que el hombre fue vctima de un robo; frente a un impresionado Nicols, Fernanda le aconseja alejarse de Florencia por un tiempo, pero Nicols se niega. Al siguiente da, una criada de la hacienda Cantarrana le hace entrega a Victoria de algunas pertenencias del difunto Sergio Escalante; Victoria en compaa de Clementina- registra los documentos donde encuentra una carta de Sergio para ella. Una vez que el medico tratante visita a Florencia, Nicols en presencia de Fernanda- se lleva una gran sorpresa cuando el galeno asegura que Florencia es la misma mujer que atendio semanas atrs por la perdida de su hijo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E128
programme.desc: Convencido de que Hilario necesitaba intimidarlo para no seguir investigando sobre la muerte de su padre, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de haberle disparado a Florencia; la polica detiene la discusion. Victoria descubre a Felipe y a Clementina registrando la carta que Sergio escribio para ella, lo que la enardece; Felipe convence a Victoria de confiar en que el la ayudar a encontrar la justicia gracias a la confesion de Sergio: Fernanda Alcoy est detrs de los diversos asesinatos. Una vez en el hospital, Florencia revela todos sus secretos ante Nicols: la mujer que le disparo fue Fernanda del Casal para evitar que la acusara con la polica por la muerte de Genara y Sergio; Florencia adems asume su responsabilidad de haber provocado a Victoria para tener una ria con ella y hacer creer que fue por su culpa que perdio a su hijo, pero Victoria se contuvo; Nicols est sorprendido. El ltimo secreto que revela Florencia es que el verdadero asesino de Jaimito del Casal es Rosendo Zapata.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E17
programme.desc: Ezequiel castiga a Gregorio por su relacion con Julia, es un Aragon. Julia est desaparecida y no se conoce su paradero, es parte de la venganza contra Ezequiel. Max insiste en ayudar a Camila y ella reconoce que siente algo por el.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E18
programme.desc: Retendrn a Julia secuestrada hasta que Ezequiel le suplique que le devuelvan a su hija sana y salva. Camila no se d por vencida, quiere saber quien es El Doliente y piensa que puede ser su mam por la foto de la nia del vestido amarillo que recibio.

programme.desc: Convencido de que Hilario necesitaba intimidarlo para no seguir investigando sobre la muerte de su padre, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de haberle disparado a Florencia; la polica detiene la discusion. programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E129
programme.desc: El nico deseo de Florencia es que Nicols algn da pueda perdonarla por haberle ocultado la verdad sobre el verdadero asesino de su padre y el motivo por el cul perdio a su hijo. Una vez que Felipe se percata de que la situacion ha sido controlada por Hilario y sus peones, el joven Osuna y Clementina se entregan a amor para recuperar el tiempo perdido. Victoria le agradece a Nicols por haber trasladado a su padre al hospital y espera que Fernanda Alcoy pague por sus crmenes. Convencida de que ha cumplido con su venganza, Fernanda se resigna a acompaar a la polica, no sin antes pedir cambiarse de ropa; desde el interior de la habitacion se escucha un disparo, por lo que Federico y Nicols corren en busca de Fernanda, quien yace muerta en su cama.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E19
programme.desc: Max impaciente, quiere saber de su hermana, Julia. El plan de ellos es intercambiarla por Ezequiel para luego matarlo. En un mensaje de voz Julia le comunica la hora y el da del intercambio y Max lo acompaar.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E04 - Elephant Country
programme.desc: Ivan joins the foremost anti-poaching team in Mozambique to bring down one particular group of poachers who have been killing local elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E05 - Strongest
programme.desc: How do you decide which is the strongest animal on the Planet? Wild Ones looks at the comparative strength of the tiniest of ants to that of a might grizzly bear, or a deadly crocodile to the indestructible rhinoceros.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E06 - Cutest
programme.desc: The charming kangaroo. The cuddly koala. The beautiful butterfly. The cheerful clownfish. Or the adorable budgie - which one is the cutest of them all?

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E07 - Wild Australia
programme.desc: More than 80 percent of Australias plants, mammals, reptiles and frogs are unique to Australia and are found nowhere else in the world. Wild dingos, frisky kangaroos, deceptively cuddly looking koalas and playful platypuses are some of the most iconic of Australias wild animals.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E08 - Masters of the Sky
programme.desc: So many words describe the many ways that birds fly pelicans and kestrels soar but owls fly silently. Parrots flock, vultures swarm and eagles swoop. Radar-accurate eyes scan the ground and slotted feathers adjust flight paths as hawks attack. But, which is the true master of the sky?

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S02:E02- Naturally Noble
programme.desc: Zimbabwe was initially Southern Rhodesia and lies to the south of the Victoria Falls along the river Zambezi. Zambia was initially Northern Rhodesia and lies on the other bank of the river. Zimbabwe is a landlocked country in the south-east of Africa. It borders with South Africa to the south. According to archaeologists, the earliest records indicate that first human settlements in this area reach back to the 3rd century.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S02:E03 - Naturally Sustaining
programme.desc: We journey in search of incredible miracles of nature begins on the Canary Islands. Lanzarote is of a volcanic origin. Volcanic activity created a fantastical landscape, similar to that on Mars. On Gran Canarias we will witness a traditional harvest of a crop that has been brought to the rest of the world from here - sugarcane. We will wrap up this episode in the Moroccan province of Gulemin, a home to a nomadic tribe whose inseparable companions are camels.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S04:E10 - Montana Whitetail
programme.desc: Laramy embraces the challeges presented when hunting Whitetail deer in Montana.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E24 - The Queen Her True Story
programme.desc: The story of an extraordinary woman and her incredible life.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E13 - Operation Wardens
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E01 - Operation OHV
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens launched an operation to crack down on illegal off-road vehicle use. We also join a patrol along the Missouri River to ensure boaters are safe and following the rules.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E03 - Band of Ten
programme.desc: The crew reaches a canyon where they find a group of ten rams. After the thrill of the first wave, they quickly become disappointed and frustrated when none of the rams are legally suitable.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E01 - Naturally Breathtaking
programme.desc: Do you know where in the world the last untouched glacier is? Where is the highest and the smallest waterfall? Which desert is the driest or the largest? Would you like to know where the most inaccessible mountains, the lowest point of the oceans or the great salt deserts are? This series offers all the answers.In the first episode, we discover breathtaking glaciers in Argentina, infinite plane in the middle of Europe, thermal miracles of Hungary, stalactite caves protected by UNESCO and the most active volcano in New Zealand White island.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E03 - St Tropez and St Lucia
programme.desc: In the South of France, 100 kilometres west of Nice, is the famous town of St Tropez. Once a sleepy fishing village, today it is quite possibly the most Jet-Set-Resort in Europe where the rich and famous holiday. Known as the most romantic island in the Caribbean we explore the beauty and everything St Lucia has to offer.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E04 - Ulagala, Sri Lanka and Florence
programme.desc: Sri Lanka, to the south of Asia, is an idyllic Buddhist island, where cows roam free and ancient monuments and temples can be found almost everywhere. Then its off to the busy Italian city of Florence, an art lovers paradise, where world famous pieces of art can be found hanging in virtually every museum.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E07 - Crossroads
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan Pt2. Corey makes a last ditch attempt to find an Ibex before a satellite phone call changes everything, he must now choose between his family and his best hunting buddy.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E25 - Kate The Making Of A Modern Queen
programme.desc: A look at the Duchess of Cambridges journey from being an everyday young woman to becoming a future queen, and what her evolution signifies for the royal family.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E24 - The Queen Her True Story
programme.desc: The story of an extraordinary woman and her incredible life.

programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E01 - Operation OHV
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens launched an operation to crack down on illegal off-road vehicle use. We also join a patrol along the Missouri River to ensure boaters are safe and following the rules.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E03 - Band of Ten
programme.desc: The crew reaches a canyon where they find a group of ten rams. After the thrill of the first wave, they quickly become disappointed and frustrated when none of the rams are legally suitable.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E01 - Naturally Breathtaking
programme.desc: Do you know where in the world the last untouched glacier is? Where is the highest and the smallest waterfall? Which desert is the driest or the largest? Would you like to know where the most inaccessible mountains, the lowest point of the oceans or the great salt deserts are? This series offers all the answers.In the first episode, we discover breathtaking glaciers in Argentina, infinite plane in the middle of Europe, thermal miracles of Hungary, stalactite caves protected by UNESCO and the most active volcano in New Zealand White island.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E03 - St Tropez and St Lucia
programme.desc: In the South of France, 100 kilometres west of Nice, is the famous town of St Tropez. Once a sleepy fishing village, today it is quite possibly the most Jet-Set-Resort in Europe where the rich and famous holiday. Known as the most romantic island in the Caribbean we explore the beauty and everything St Lucia has to offer.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E04 - Ulagala, Sri Lanka and Florence
programme.desc: Sri Lanka, to the south of Asia, is an idyllic Buddhist island, where cows roam free and ancient monuments and temples can be found almost everywhere. Then its off to the busy Italian city of Florence, an art lovers paradise, where world famous pieces of art can be found hanging in virtually every museum.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E07 - Crossroads
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan Pt2. Corey makes a last ditch attempt to find an Ibex before a satellite phone call changes everything, he must now choose between his family and his best hunting buddy.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E25 - Kate The Making Of A Modern Queen
programme.desc: A look at the Duchess of Cambridges journey from being an everyday young woman to becoming a future queen, and what her evolution signifies for the royal family.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E24 - The Queen Her True Story
programme.desc: The story of an extraordinary woman and her incredible life.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E13 - Operation Wardens
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E01 - Operation OHV

programme.desc: A look at the Duchess of Cambridges journey from being an everyday young woman to becoming a future queen, and what her evolution signifies for the royal family.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E26 - Prince William A Royal Portrait
programme.desc: Explore the exciting and intriguing life of the future king, Prince William, in this engaging documentary.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E02 - Operation Antler Blitz
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens investigate stolen antlers and join in conservation activities for sage grouse and walleye.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E04 - Now or Never
programme.desc: As the mist drifts past the craggy top of Fish Hook, the crews shapes slowly come into view right where the ram had been resting. Did they fire without Chris hearing the sound?

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E02 - Naturally Dramatic
programme.desc: This episode describes the greatest miracle of nature that could be created by the human brain. The Loch Ness monster. It looks that is does not exist but thousands of visitors still come to see the lovely lake and to hear tales about it. Not only Nessi, but the Scottish high lands are the miracle of nature.Then we quickly visit Andalusia and remove our hat in front of the majestic mountains of Sierra Nevada.The deepest lake in the world is found in Siberia. We will talk about Baikal, the natural miracle of Russia.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E03 - Naturally Diverse
programme.desc: The episode focuses on the Arabian peninsula. The endless red desert in Oman contrasts with Yemen s island of Socotra. The endemic crabs from Socotra compete with sea turtles who gather on a single beach in Oman to lay their eggs. And, it is also claimed that the petrified rock formation is of Noahs Ark.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E05 - Parrot Cay and Algave
programme.desc: Portugals Algarve region has long attracted holidaymakers looking to relax and soak up the sun. Portugal is also quickly becoming known for its great tasting wines. But if Europe is too crowded for your travel tastes then how about the private island resort of Parrot Cay in the Caribbean Turks and Caicos Islands, where you can escape, relax and recharge your batteries in the lap of luxury.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E06 - Barcelona and London
programme.desc: Located in Northern Spain, Barcelona is one of the most vibrant and cultural cities in Europe. The Luxury Travel Show explores many of the citys quirky and unique buildings designed by the famous architect, Antoni Gaudi. A city thats equally full of famous buildings is London where a helicopter tour along the River Thames offers birds eye views of London Bridge, The Houses of Parliament, the London Eye and so much more.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E08 - Goodbyes
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea. Jim heads to one of the most dangerous places on the planet while Corey, choosing to stay behind, takes his horse on a lone hunt through the badlands where he grew up.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E30 - Prince William And Prince Harry Prisoners Of Celebrity
programme.desc: Two young men who have had to cope with extraordinarily challenging events and circumstances as, together, they have gone on to change the face of the British royal family and carve meaningful roles for themselves in the modern world. Made in 1999 two years after the death of their mother, Princess Diana, this original and touching documentary examines the lives of the royal princes, the legacy of their mother, the responsibilities of being a royal - and what the future holds for them.

programme.desc: Explore the exciting and intriguing life of the future king, Prince William, in this engaging documentary.

programme.title: Meet me in New York
programme.desc: Ambitious New York events planner Kelly is one of the best in the business. But when Joe, a stubborn, but influential website editor, hires her to organize his nieces birthday, Kelly soon realizes that she may have met her match.

programme.title: The Wedding Contest
programme.desc: When a couple cant decide on a wedding theme, they hire two wedding planners, Taylor and Ben, to compete for the job by proposing two very different styles.

programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before its too late.

programme.title: Been There All Along
programme.desc: After her public breakup, Charley, determined founder of a dating app, is near bankruptcy and teamed up with Liam, a self-assured and innovative marketing expert, to save her company.

programme.title: Candid About Love
programme.desc: Laura, a gallery assistant and wannabe fine art photographer, is finally promised a spot in a Newcomers Showcase - but only if she can get a reclusive artist, Shane, to premiere his newest photographs at the gallery. When Laura discovers that Shane hasnt taken a new photo in ten years, shes determined to help him find his way back to his art whether he wants her to or not.

programme.title: Killer Cover Up
programme.desc: All-star soccer player Jenna Sims and her mom Sally are ready for a new start when they move to a new, sunny beach town. But when other members of her new soccer team start turning up dead and one ends up in a coma, Jenna finds herself accused of the crime.

programme.title: Love in Translation
programme.desc: Linguistics Ph.D. student Julie, can speak almost every language you can imagine. Things turn upside down for Julie when handsome Dan, contacts her to get some French classes. Sparks soon fly - could this be their perfect match?

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E06 - Monaco
programme.desc: Team Rafa, leading the championship, rolls into Monaco as the top contenders. However, the competition takes place right under the watchful eye of sporting great and team owner, Rafa Nadal. This isnt your typical weekendits a standout event in the chronicles of E1 racing.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E02 - Doha
programme.desc: Watch the electric excitement unfold in Doha, Qatarthe stunning Pearl Island circuit buzzed with speed, tension, and milestone-firsts as the E1 Series returned in February 2025.

programme.title: ABP Aquabike World Championship - S02:E04 - ABP Aquabike-Weltmeisterschaft Olbia 2025
programme.desc: The worlds fastest riders return to Sardinia for the ABP Aquabike World Championship Olbia 2025. In the Ski Division, speed, agility and balance meet rough Mediterranean waters as the best athletes battle for vital championship points. Explosive starts, high waves and breathtaking overtakes deliver pure power and precision in this spectacular highlight from the shores of Olbia.

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E10 - Breaking Point The Sassnitz Miracle
programme.desc: Storms, accidents, and an all-time record storm put the SailGP teams to the test. But after a miraculous repair, Frances Quentin Delapierre made a remarkable comeback and won in Sassnitz.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E02 - Re-Live Jeddah Race Off
programme.desc: Dive into the thrilling season opener of the 2025 UIME1 World Championship in Jeddah! The Aoki Racing Team, backed by DJ Steve Aoki, surged ahead to claim victory in a breathtaking opener on January 25, marking their first-ever E1 podium finish

programme.title: Racing on the Edge - S02:E07
programme.desc: With the SailGP season reaching its halfway mark, the pressure to deliver consistent results mounts for every team. In this episode, cameras follow Tom Slingsbys Australia SailGP Team as they try to maintain their championship lead while rivals sharpen their tactics.

programme.desc: The worlds fastest riders return to Sardinia for the ABP Aquabike World Championship Olbia 2025. In the Ski Division, speed, agility and balance meet rough Mediterranean waters as the best athletes battle for vital championship points. Explosive starts, high waves and breathtaking overtakes deliver pure power and precision in this spectacular highlight from the shores of Olbia.
